fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY Parallel New York
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[BOOK_LOCATION] = "New York",
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY Parallel],
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF ... THEN ... ELSE ... END to DAX IF(). Replaced Tableau column references with 'table_name'[ColumnName] format: [BOOK_LOCATION] -> 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[BOOK_LOCATION] and [Delta Down All CCY Parallel] -> 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY Parallel]. This is a row-level calculation (no aggregations or parameters), so it is a calculated column.
